name: APIGatewayMethodIntegrationIntegrationResponse
description: IntegrationResponse is a property of the Amazon API Gateway Method Integration property that specifies the response that Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) sends after a method's back end finishes processing a request.

properties.name: ResponseParameters
properties.desc: The response parameters from the back-end response that API Gateway sends to the method response. Specify response parameters as key-value pairs (string-to-string maps), with a destination as the key and a source as the value.

properties.name: ResponseTemplates
properties.desc: The templates used to transform the integration response body. Specify templates as key-value pairs (string-to-string maps), with a content type as the key and a template as the value.

properties.name: SelectionPattern
properties.desc: A regular expression that specifies which error strings or status codes from the back end map to the integration response.

properties.name: StatusCode
properties.desc: The status code that API Gateway uses to map the integration response to a MethodResponse status code.
